title_advert: ['Dubai Style Townhouse | Community Close to Metro']
descriptions:
['DescriptionAQUA Properties proudly presents this family orientated 3-Bedroom Dubai Style Townhouse located in the heart of the Al Furjan Community close to Spinneys in The Pavilion. This type A corner unit offers a spacious living and dining area, as well as a nice large kitchen and plenty of storage area. All around balcony overlooks this emerging community. The upstairs area offers additional living room. The residents can enjoy the backyard with a beautiful garden area.
Description:
• BUA: 3,052 sq.ft.
• Type A | Corner unit
• Presently Tenanted
• Spacious living area and dining section
• Maids room
• Spacious kitchen
• Lots of storage areas
• Second living area upstairs
• Balcony all round
• Parking for 2 cars
• Backyard with garden area
• Close to park
Inspired by Dubai’s Fareej or Single Village, Al Furjan has been created to symbolize a close Community of extended Family and Friends. This Townhouse is walking distance to the Al Furjan Clubhouse which comprises of a large gym, swimming pool and restaurant alongside many eateries, shops and large Spinneys in the Al Furjan Pavilion.']

Forte Tower Apartments is an exceptional two-tower residential project located in the world’s renowned Opera District in Downtown Dubai. Forte Apartments Tower 2 features 41 storeys, designed by internationally renowned and world-class architecture practice Nikken Sekkei, the dual tower complex reflects the Japanese firm’s values of community credibility, selective design and collective independence. The premier residences are offering a selection of 2-3 bedroom apartments created with welcoming interiors with beautifully-blended hues.
This premium residential project is now offering 3 Years Post Handover Payment Plan, making residents to easily buy this great property in an easy and flexible payment schedule.
We always make sure that all of our agents and back office team stay up to date with any changes that occur within the real estate market following on from your investment, our aftercare team will be on hand to ensure that you are not only happy with the buying process but also have support and guidance afterwards. descriptions: ["DescriptionJohn Taylor Luxury Real Estate presents the bespoke villas in the Heart of Dubai, Sobha Hartland.\xa0Discover Hartland EstatesThe villa collection was designed to reflect - aim to offer residents the opportunity to reach new heights and enjoy unprecedented levels of comfort and privacy. The development imagined and designed luxurious villas immersed in an oasis of green and rich forestry along the Dubai Canal, adding beauty and value to our residents lives. The highest level of attention to detail and care has been placed to provide residents with a haute couture lifestyle experience in every sense. The development houses four communities featuring four different lifestyles, with a variety of unit plans to choose from, ranging from urban chic townhouses of 4 bedrooms to stately mansions of 4 or 5 bedrooms, as well as bespoke canal facing villas.\xa0Canal Villas | Forest Villas | Gardenia Villas | Townhouses\xa0Canal VillasArrive in your private yacht.
